mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imagePath, regdate FROM trade_board
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trade_board (num, writer, title, content, imagePath, regdate) VALUES(trade_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM trade_board ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
